product_description: Flaky and buttery pastries with light and airy layers. Available plain or filled with chocolate or almond paste.
Artisanal fermented bread with a distinctive tangy flavor and chewy texture. Made with a natural sourdough starter.
Sweet, spiral-shaped pastries made from soft and yeasty dough. Filled with a delicious cinnamon and sugar mixture.
Delicate and colorful French sandwich cookies with a crisp exterior and chewy interior. Available in a variety of flavors.
Twice-baked Italian cookies known for their crisp and crunchy texture. Flavored with almonds and optional chocolate chips or dried fruits.
Classic American cupcakes with a vibrant red color and subtle cocoa flavor. Topped with cream cheese frosting.
Timeless American dessert featuring a flaky pastry crust filled with sweet and spiced apple filling. Best served warm.
Sweet Eastern European bread with layers of twisted dough and chocolate filling. Rich and decadent, perfect for breakfast or dessert.
